```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(broom)
poll_data <- tibble(biden = as.factor(c(rep("Yes", 655), 
                                        rep("No", 904)))) |> 
                slice_sample(prop = 1)
```

The 2024 election pitted Trump vs Biden. Voters would vote Yes or No to Biden. The data was collected from the United States election committee. A potential wekaness in my model is not showing the proper causation for why the citizen decided to vote or not to vote for Biden.
